snippet: An effort to develop an easy way for consumers to avoid being tracked and targeted by Internet advertisers appeared to have hit an impasse Thursday.
abstract: Effort to develop an easy way for consumers around the world to avoid being tracked and targeted by Internet advertisers appears to hit an impasse, as privacy advocates and industry representatives accuse each other of scuttling the process.
lead_paragraph: An effort to develop an easy way for consumers to avoid being tracked and targeted by Internet advertisers appeared to have hit an impasse Thursday.

headline.main: Privacy Advocates and Advertisers at Odds Over Web Tracking
headline.print_headline: No Resolution Is Reached In a ‘Do Not Track’ Effort
